from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

counter = 0

for i in Counter(s).values():

# 入力
from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()
# 文字列をカウント
c = Counter(s)
# 全ての文字をカウントした値から、文字列の長さを引く
ans = n - sum(c.values())

print(ans)

#!/usr/bin/python3
from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

counter = 0

for i in Counter(s).values():
    counter += i - 1

print(counter)


from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

c = Counter(s)
ans = n - sum(c.values()) // 2

print(ans)

from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

c = Counter(s)
ans = n - sum(c.values())

print(ans)


from collections import Counter
n = int(input())
s = input()


counter = 0

for i in Counter(s).values():
    counter += i - 1

print(counter)
